ygData.subject: Re: twinked? / EQ ettiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: I never really understood this.  The amount of information given in an inspect (ie no stats on items etc) seems to me to be equivalent to just LOOKING AT
ygData.messageBody:
I never really understood this. The amount of information given in an
inspect (ie no stats on items etc) seems to me to be equivalent to just
LOOKING AT someone. Do you have to shield your eyes when looking at someone
unless they give you their okay?

Slyde 35 Bard of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: "Mitzi" <mitzi@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 07, 2000 3:46 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] twinked? / EQ ettiquette


> From: "Mitzi" <mitzi@...>
>
> I'm also high lvl and it only slightly bothers me.. just common curtosy to
> say hi is all I ask.. I even put it in my bio tho.. which says something
